node.statement: (MAIN-corrected) Combining FTC (1.3), CE-RE (1.2), and corrected DER-HS (1.6, via 1.6.6): H(A|B)_sigma - H(A|B)_rho = -integral_0^1 [integral_{1/d_A}^{M_fwd(t)} Tr[P_beta(t) delta_AB^{(beta)}]/beta dbeta + integral_{d_A}^{M_rev(t)} Tr[Q_beta(t)(1_A tensor delta_B - beta delta_AB)]/beta^2 dbeta] dt. Fubini applies: both inner integrals are over bounded intervals with bounded integrands. Supersedes the incorrect single-integral MAIN formula.
